column3: We can get a taxi home. We {{c1::needn't}} walk.
I have to talk to Gary. I {{c1::mustn't}} forget to call him.

We {{c1::needn't}} wash the tomatoes.
They've already been washed.
You {{c1::needn't}} wait for me. You go on and I'll join you later.

These are very valuable documents.
You {{c1::mustn't}} lose them.
We must be very careful. We {{c1::mustn't}} do anything stupid.
I understand the situation completely. You {{c1::needn't}} explain further.

A: What sort of house do you want to buy? Something big?
B: Well, it {{c1::needn't}} be big – that's not so important. But it must have a nice garden – that’s essential.
